Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class MessageSenderToMyClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.MessageSenderToMyClient
public class MessageSenderToMyClient
extends java.lang.Object
this is the object to use to send messages only to your client (NOT IN BROADCAST) it creates json format strings with the passed variables in the methods
